title: Bloomberg Markets: Bond King Bill Gross Falls to Middle of Pack
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bond King Bill Gross Falls to Middle of Pack
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Peggy Collins \u0010US Investing Team Leader/Personal Finance Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Discussing as Bill Gross approaches the third anniversary of his ouster from Pacific Investment Management Co., his performance has been merely OK.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
